Package itt.t00154755.mouseserver

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AppRobot
    This is the class that controls the mapping of the accelerometer readings to the cursor on the screen.
    AppRunServer
    Class used to run the server listener.
    AppServer
    This class creates a stream connection using the Bluecove API.
    AppServerGUI
    Built using the Swing Design Eclipse Plug-in AppServerGUI allows the user to interact with the server, also give a visual output as to whether the server is running or not.
    AppServerUtils
    This is the utilities class for the server.
    AppStreamReader
    This class get the InputStream and reads in the data converts it to a String and passes it on to the AppRobot class.
